resources.string: i) This is a quiz to test your knowledge about the cosmos.
ii) 1 mark will be awarded for each correct answer.
iii) Multiple choice questions will be considered correct if only all the correct options are checked.
1. Which of these is the hottest planet in our solar system ?
2. Which of these are rocky planets in our solar system ?
3. The range of orbits around a star where the temperature is just right - not too hot and not too cold - for liquid water to exist on an planet given sufficient atmospheric pressure is called ?
5. What are the possible aftermath of a star\'s death.
6. What is a highly magnetized rotating neutron star or white dwarf that emits a beam of electromagnetic radiation called ?
7. Where is our Solar System located in the milky way ?
8. Which of the following are the possible types of galaxies as classified by NASA ?
9. What is an interstellar cloud of dust, hydrogen, helium and other ionised gas called ?
10. Who experimentally proved that the universe is constantly expanding ?
You attempted %d questions. Try to attempt all.
